agent.strategies

Class Strategy

  • java.lang.Object
    • agent.strategies.Strategy
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Adaptive, AlwaysCooperate, AlwaysDefect, Gradual, Grudger, Pavlov, Random, SoftGrudger, TitForTat, TitForTwoTats

    public class Strategy
extends java.lang.Object
    An object that contains all of the information and functionality required to perform a strategy for the Prisoner's Dilemma.
    Author:
    Pedro Freire
